meanings.definition: A dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.

meanings.sent4: Her tiramisus were like a sweet symphony in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly made tiramisus filled the room.
